control_attributes.Control: SI-7 (8) AUDITING CAPABILITY FOR SIGNIFICANT EVENTS
control_attributes.control_description: The information system, upon detection of a potential integrity violation, provides the capability to audit the event and initiates the following actions: [Selection (one or more): generates an audit record; alerts current user; alerts [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles]; [Assignment: organization-defined other actions]].
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system verifies the integrity of the boot process of [Assignment: organization-defined devices].

Control Statement: The information system, upon detection of a potential integrity violation, provides the capability to audit the event and initiates the following actions: [Selection (one or more): generates an audit record; alerts current user; alerts [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles]; [Assignment: organization-defined other actions]].
Control Name: SI-7 (8) AUDITING CAPABILITY FOR SIGNIFICANT EVENTS
